  • SEARCH: 
 

Uses of Package
hippodrome

  • Packages that use hippodrome 
    Package Description
    clients
    Provides the classes necessary to represent any hippodrome region on the client side of the execution.
    hippodrome
    Provides the classes necessary to create an environment needed to complete a horse race scenario.
    server
    Provides the classes necessary to represent any hippodrome region on the server side of the execution.
  • Classes in hippodrome used by clients 
    Class Description
    BettingCentreInterface
    Interface of the place where the Spectators place their bets on the winning horse.
    ControlCentreInterface
    Interface of the place where the Spectators go to enjoy the race (at a Watching Stand) and the Broker controls the races and publishes its results.
    GeneralInformationRepositoryInterface
    Interface of the class which represents an archive of all hippodrome's actions and memorabilia.
    PaddockInterface
    Interface of the place where the horses are paradded before the Spectators.
    RacingTrackInterface
    Interface of the place where the races take place.
    StableInterface
    Interface of the place where the horses rest waiting their turn to enter the competition.
  • Classes in hippodrome used by hippodrome
